Description: Taking care of her dying Aunt Sally, the only mother she has ever known, Carolyn Smith is stunned when Sally's son Alex returns after eighteen years, especially since she witnessed his murder on the night of his supposed disappearance, and as she races against time to expose the sensual imposter, she enters a world of dark secrets, passion, and deceit.
